file.js(12,27): error TS2749: 'BaseFactory' refers to a value, but is being used as a type here. Did you mean 'typeof BaseFactory'?


==== base.js (1 errors) ====
    class Base {
        constructor() {}
    }
    
    const BaseFactory = () => {
        return new Base();
    };
    
    BaseFactory.Base = Base;
    
    module.exports = BaseFactory;
    ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2580: Cannot find name 'module'. Do you need to install type definitions for node? Try `npm i --save-dev @types/node`.
